title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother falling into a hole in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother falling into a hole in a dream. Scientists give different meanings to what we see in dreams. Below we learn about the interpretation of a dream about my mother falling into a hole in a dream and others. Interpretation of a dream about my mother falling into a hole in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my mother falling into a hole in a dream, we did not find Specific interpretations to see thatHowever, seeing someone falling into a hole in a dream could be a sign of bad news, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a person falling into a hole in a dream, this may indicate that he has committed sins and needs to repent, and God knows the unseen. When A single girl sees someone falling into a hole in a dream. This could be a sign of loss, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter falling into a basin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter falling into a basin in a dream could lead to a loss of tenderness, and God knows the unseen. Where if the dreamer sees his daughter falling into a hole The sink may express the loss of a daughter’s tenderness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a son falling into a hole, this may indicate envy, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a child falling into a hole, this may indicate sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my friend with a child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my friend with a child in A dream can lead to good news, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his unmarried friend carrying a child, he can express the happy news, God willing. When you see a pregnant friend carrying a small child, this may indicate the birth of a girl, and God is Most High and Most Knowledgeable. Seeing my friend carrying a child in a dream It can represent kindness and living, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my drunk friend in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my drunk friend. If the dreamer sees a drunk man in a dream, this may be evidence of committing sins, and God knows best. When you see a drunk person in a dream, this could be a sign For the good that will succeed, God willing. Also, seeing sugar in a dream can indicate the problems that the dreamer faces, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about my friend who was writing her book in a dream. Interpretation of my friend’s dream about writing her book in a dream. Perhaps writing the book will fulfill desires, God willing, as if he sees The dreamer sees someone he knows writing a book in a dream, so this may be evidence of his ability to achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. In the case of a single young man seeing his girlfriend’s book, it could be evidence of kindness and sustenance, God willing. If a single girl sees her friend’s book written in a dream, it may symbolize To kindness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my sister’s book in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which I wrote my sister’s book in a dream can lead to achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees writing the book in a dream, it can be evidence of sincerity, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see the book’s books in a dream, it can It will be a sign of excellence and success, God willing. If the dreamer sees that he wrote a book in a dream, it can be a sign of goodness and sustenance, God willing. Interpretation of a dream that my brother wrote a book in a dream. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing boiling coffee in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing boiled coffee in a dream: Coffee is a stimulating drink that has many benefits, and many people take it to stay up late. Seeing coffee in a dream has many meanings, such as abundance and goodness. It can indicate the marriage of a young man and a girl, and we will explain that in detail in this article, the interpretation of seeing boiling coffee in a dream for an unmarried young man, and an unmarried girl and man. Pregnant and unmarried people, as well as divorced and widowed people, and they provide interpretations of some imams by interpreters of ancient and modern times, in a vision space. What is the interpretation of seeing boiling coffee in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? If someone sees you pouring coffee, I suffer from anxiety, tension, and psychological problems. I see myself drinking ground coffee Mixed with saffron, it indicates prosperity and goodness. Seeing a cup of coffee expresses worry and worry. Seeing it being made in a pregnant woman’s dream. Female birthmark. Watching a man making coffee indicates wealth and goodness in his life. Watching coffee being prepared for an unmarried young man indicates new projects. Seeing brewed coffee indicates the presence of Who tempts the dreamer. What is the interpretation of a dream about ground coffee? Seeing a coffee grinder in a person’s dream indicates problems on the way to a disaster or something unpleasant for the dreamer. If someone sees that he is grinding coffee himself, it can indicate a lot of food that he expects and good news that he will hear soon. Seeing dry coffee beans indicates freedom from worries and problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about offering coffee to someone? If a young man sees a girl offering him coffee, it indicates that he will marry this girl or that he will marry soon. Seeing dissatisfaction with the girl’s proposed brother-in-law indicates that this marriage will result. About evil and evil. A girl dreams of her fiancé in an unpleasant or unpleasant way. It announces the dissolution of the engagement. What is the interpretation of a dream about drinking coffee with milk? Seeing someone drinking coffee with milk in a dream indicates a commitment to fulfilling rights and obligations that may be neglected. Seeing a woman offering her husband coffee with milk announces very good and the food is on The way: Seeing coffee with dates expresses feelings of anxiety and confusion. Seeing someone pouring coffee indicates the large amount of spending on the poor and needy. What is the interpretation of a dream about drinking Arabic coffee for a single woman? The vision while drinking Arabic coffee or green coffee indicates the abundance of fraudsters and deception in the life of an unmarried girl. Vision A cup of coffee in a single woman’s dream remembers the approach of her engagement. Seeing him pouring coffee for a single girl indicates feelings of anxiety, sadness, and a bad psychological state that she is experiencing. Seeing drinking coffee in a single woman’s dream indicates problems and psychological pressure. What is the interpretation of seeing a bag of coffee in a dream? Seeing buying large quantities Of coffee bags, it indicates many good deeds in the coming period of the dreamer’s life. Seeing a woman asking her husband for a bag of coffee and being late in requesting it indicates that some things will not be completed in it or will be completed shortly. Seeing a young man working in a café and serving coffee heralds goodness for the coming period of his life. If A young man was seen drinking

title: Interpretation of seeing a lost road in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lost road in a dream through vision roy2a.com Seeing a lost road in a dream is a vision that can feel strange and confusing for those who see it and may wonder about the meaning and importance of this vision. Or vice versa, interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of losing the road in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the person who sees it, and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through Roya’s website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a lost road in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a lost road in a dream? Ibn Sirin: Seeing a lost road in a dream indicates a distance Insight about the truth and its followers in desire and error. Seeing a lost path in a crowded street in a dream indicates opportunities that the viewer will miss and goals that he will fail to achieve. Seeing a blocked road in a dream indicates extreme sadness and a bad psychological state that the dreamer is experiencing. See also: Interpretation of seeing Maqamat Ahl al-Bayt in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a lost road in Nabulsi’s dream: Seeing a lost road in a dream indicates the dreamer’s feeling of anxiety and hesitation about something in his life. Seeing a lost road in a dream indicates that the viewer is doing his best and wasting his time in what is of no benefit. In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer is suffering from anxiety and extreme sadness during this period. What is the interpretation of seeing a lost road in a dream for a single woman: Seeing lonely people losing their way in a dream expresses her preoccupation with the future and her fear of the coming days. Seeing lonely people losing their way in a dream shows that she lacks a sense of security And security in her life.Seeing lonely people losing their way in a dreamIt shows that there are memories from the past that she yearns for and longs for.Seeing lonely people losing their way in a dreamIt shows that a state of despair, frustration, and a negative outlook on things dominates him.Seeing a single woman losing her way in a dream according to some interpreters Immediately, it indicates a new and different phase that will begin in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Eid sacrifices in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the road lost in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman losing her way in a dream indicates the many pressures she receives and the great responsibilities she bears, which make her suffer in her life. Seeing a married woman losing her way in a dream announces that she will encounter hypocrites and bad morals in her life. Seeing a married woman on a road with crops and water in a dream announces that blessings and goodness fill her home and that she will have good offspring. A married woman who saw that her husband lost his way in a dream expresses her concern for her home, family, and concern. Permanent in their lives and their future. See also: Interpretation of seeing a finger wound in a dream Interpretation of seeing a lost road in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman losing her way in a dream It is simply a reflection of the state of stress and tension in which the viewer is living at this time. Seeing a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of a chicken in a dream: Seeing chicks in a dream

preview.html: What does it mean to eat chickens and chicks for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, whether a dead chicken, buying eggs, selling raw or cooked, or peeling one slaughtered on the grill? Seeing and eating chicken in a dream is a good omen and a good sign, and it predicts that the dreamer will obtain a benefit. Seeing chicken grilled or fried means obtaining money or profit. But after toil and trouble. And whoever sees that he is eating raw chicken, it means that he is luring people with his tongue. In general, seeing chicken meat in a dream means that you will get a lot of money. Seeing him eating a chicken head means the death of a woman near the dreamer or a neighbor of his. Seeing yourself eating a chicken breast means getting a job. Or a job or a trip. As for eating chicken legs, it indicates a good wife who has good sex. Seeing yourself eating a chicken leg or legs means that you will go to a bad and lonely place. Dreaming of a chicken fortune teller accompanied by small chicks is considered a bad omen, because it indicates the deterioration of life and loss. Seeing many Chicken in a dream means that there are many children. Seeing a live chicken in a dream is a strong indication that the dreamer is preoccupied with life issues related to earning a livelihood, money, and livelihood. As for seeing a person in his dream as if he is chasing chickens and chasing them, it symbolizes the pursuit of livelihood. Catching a chicken means obtaining a sum of money. Seeing a fat white chicken deserves praise because it symbolizes a generous woman. As for seeing a thin black chicken, it symbolizes a barren, barren woman who does not sting. Hearing the sound of a chicken in a dream is not good, because it warns of waste, and seeing chicken droppings indicates neglect in raising children. Seeing eggs Chicken symbolizes money. Buying chicken in a dream indicates good luck. Seeing buying a fat chicken means marrying a wealthy woman. Buying a white chicken means marrying a generous woman. Buying a tender chicken symbolizes marrying a woman who has no children. Buying a black chicken symbolizes a marriage of interests on the male or female level. As for seeing selling chickens In a dream, it is a symbol of wasting money in a man’s dream or neglecting to raise children in a woman’s dream. As for the person who sees cooked chicken in a dream, this symbolizes the moderation of internal affairs and financial situation. Cooked chicken in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the stability of the home. Seeing cooked chicken in a pregnant woman’s dream It is good news for a male child, and in an unmarried woman’s dream it portends marriage to a capable man. A boiled chicken in a dream symbolizes the curses that people take against the dreamer. Whoever sees that he is peeling a chicken, this vision portends the illness of his wife or daughter. Seeing an unmarried man skinning his chicken means that he will suffer from a misfortune. It will lead to his imprisonment. And whoever sees that she is peeling a chicken, this indicates that she will drown or wrong her sister. An unmarried girl who dreams of skinning a chicken, this means that she is wronging herself in one of the matters or matters that concern her. A raw chicken in a dream indicates a woman who has no use for her. Behind it and symbolizes irrationality, neglect and

title: Interpretation of seeing a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We will learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a brother in a dream that a brother is one of the blessings that God gives to a person, as he is his supporter in life and helps him, and there is no evidence for that. The greatness of God’s grace is what God Almighty said in the language of our master Moses: “And make me a servant from my family.” Aaron, my brother. Strengthening my pregnancy through him and getting him involved in my relationship.” Through the lines of this article, we will discover what dream interpretation scholars have said about seeing a brother in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a brother in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a brother in a dream is a good dream, and it is good for the dreamer, and in the details: Whoever saw His brother in a dream, then this dream shows the extent of the brother’s love for his brother and his attachment to him, as it shows the love that this brother feels for his brother. Whoever sees in a dream that there is competition and disagreements between him and his brother and there were no problems between them in reality, then this vision shows the strong relationships that bind The two brothers in reality. But if there are problems and differences between them in reality, then this vision expresses the extent of sadness he feels because of these differences. Whoever dreams that his brother is suffering from some health problems in his sleep, this dream symbolizes the problems and worries that the owner is exposed to. The vision, which makes him feel very sad. Whoever sees his brother getting married and attending his wedding, this dream portends to the dreamer that his marriage is approaching. And if one sees that his brother is wearing new and elegant clothes, he feels happy and comfortable seeing her, then this dream means that the dreamer will soon receive good news. Whoever sees the death of his brother in a dream and buries him. This vision is one of the dreams that cannot be predicted, as it symbolizes the presence of serious disagreements between the dreamer and his brother, and that these disagreements cause him a great deal of distress and sadness, and we advise the dreamer to try to solve these problems with him. My brother, and restoring good relations between them. Interpretation of seeing an older brother in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who saw in her sleep the death of her brother and he was not buried and no one cried over him. This vision heralds to the dreamer a long life to be spent in obedience to God Almighty, God willing. If a girl sees in her dream that her mother gave birth to her brother, then this dream symbolizes that this girl will begin a new period of her life soon, and this means that she will soon get married or travel to another country. For marriage. Education or obtaining a wonderful job opportunity. It is an auspicious vision for a girl to see in her dream that her brother is getting married. Interpretation of seeing a brother for a married woman. A married woman sees her brother in a dream. This vision promises her that she will become pregnant soon, and God Almighty will grant her good offspring. Some commentators said that this vision means that she has a good relationship with her brother. One of the bad dreams for a married woman is that she sees in her dream that her brother has died and she is burying him. This vision means that there will be disagreements between this woman and her brother and there will be serious arguments to sever the ties that bind them to her. We advise the woman who sees this vision to do everything in her power so that she does not end up with a cat

title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing here a bicycle made of gold with gold, and God knows best, where he sleeps in prison, illness, or chains, and God knows best. As for whoever sees gold in his dream, in its raw form, this indicates that the sleeper will discover or discover Indeed, a new talent that he loves. Interpretation of seeing gold signs in a dream. Whoever sees pure gold signs in a dream, these signs usually carry an interpretation that the sleeper will achieve great success. Interpretation of seeing a solid block of gold. Whoever sees in his dream a solid and strong piece of gold, this solid piece usually indicates The sleeper ignores his work and the important things that can change the course of his life forever. As for whoever sees that he is wearing two bracelets of gold and silver, they carry bad tidings, and evil will happen to the sleeper, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a gold fish in a dream: The dream of a gold fish is one of the common dreams at the Gate of Gold. And it is good skin because it indicates success and success. Interpretation of seeing gold for women. But if a woman sees that she is wearing a golden crown, the interpretation of the dream is that she will marry a very rich man, but he is cruel, unfair, and unfair to her. But if a woman sees that she dreams of a golden plate, but it breaks, This means that one of the people or patients around it will die. Different interpretations of gold in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that his eye turns into gold here means that the sleeper will lose his sight, and God knows best. And whoever sees in his dream that his hand has turned into gold, the interpretation of the solution means that something bad will happen to him. He may lose the ability to move his hands. As for the one who dreams that he is trying to hide gold, this indicates that the sleeper is trying to hide some secrets. But if the merchant sees that he is carrying a golden wreath above his head, then gold here indicates that the merchant will lose his business unfortunately. As for the one who dreams that the word gold has changed, this means that God knows the deficiency or deficiency of goodness and blessing in food, children, or wife. Unfortunately, gold in a dream is one of the things that carries bad and harmful interpretations and the chances of problems arising or appearing or losing people or losing people or changing. The situation goes from good to bad.

title: Interpretation of receiving money from the dead

preview.html: It is a warning from God not to commit sins. Does the interpretation of this vision differ depending on the condition of the dreamer? This is what we will explain in this article from our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of the vision of receiving money from the dead in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl receives money from a dead man in her dream. Good news about her marriage soon or something happy for her. And if the person from whom she took Money from him in a dream, you do not know it. You will get a prestigious and profitable job that will earn you a lot of money. Seeing a single woman whose deceased mother gave her money and it was a new piece of paper. A young man will propose to ask for her hand in marriage, God willing. Paper money in a dream of singles from a person Dead. A good person for marriage has a good reputation among people. This vision indicates positive material changes in the lives of unmarried women. And his ability to achieve the goals he wants. Seeing an unmarried woman being given banknotes by her deceased uncle is evidence of positive and happy changes. And a lot of money. A lot of money in one dream, dreams that she would like to achieve in reality. Or she feels uncomfortable and insecure in her life. Coins in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate problems and worries, and God knows best. As for paper money, it means that the unmarried woman will have a lot. Of real estate or inheritance. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person taking the clothes of a living person and its meaning. Interpretation of a vision of taking money from the dead in a dream. This vision in a married woman’s dream indicates her need for money and help. What if she took notes from a dead person and evidence of her guilt and a lot of money. The dream of a woman A married woman with many banknotes is evidence that she will give birth to many girls. Gold coins, evidence of many male descendants. The wife took notes from the deceased, marital happiness and peace of mind. The vision also indicates abundant goodness and ample living that her husband will receive. If she She gets money from her deceased father and was happy with it. All her worries and problems will go away, God willing. Interpretation of the vision of receiving money from the dead in a dream about the man and its meaning. The man received money from a dead person, a blessing and a lot of money. And if the person suffers from problems and fears, they will leave him, God willing. In his dream, a man took money and fruits from a dead person. A lot of money and wealth, God willing. And if he has a job, he will earn a lot of money from it. If a person takes money from a dead person and then the dead person takes it back. He will fail in a project or something in his life that will not be completed. When he takes The man money from death and the death will be sad. This man will earn a lot of money and they will disappear after a while, and God knows best. Giving money to a dead man means trouble at work or business, and God knows best. The man took coins from the dead and worries and sorrows, and they will leave after a while. The man who Money eats from death, positive changes, and the ability to achieve goals. When a man steals money from a dead person in his dream. He is blessed with money and enjoys a happy life with his family, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of dreams for the dead about taking money from the living

title: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child from feces in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child from feces in a dream for a married woman: This dream may be somewhat strange, for you. Through the following lines, we will mention the repercussions of this dream. This is from gptafser.com/. The world of dreams may differ in its interpretation for some people, as the interpretation also depends on the social, professional and psychological state of the person. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child from feces in a dream for one girl When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is cleaning the feces of a child, this is a sign of imminent marriage and that he will be in front of her A period of love. Seeing a child’s excrement in an unmarried girl’s dream may symbolize that this girl will marry a person who has feelings. Cleaning a child’s excrement in a dream indicates a special success for her, God willing. Seeing a child’s excrement in a dream is a sign of the disappearance of problems with her fiancé. God knows best. Seeing a girl whose clothes are soiled with feces as she cleans her child, this dream may not be good. It indicates false words that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a child’s chair in a dream indicates the blessing that the girl will receive, and it also carries good news that her anxiety will end. God willing. Perhaps this dream indicates that this girl will work in more than one place, God willing. If she sees herself cleaning the child’s stool with water, then this dream expresses her desire for love. And when the girl washes the child’s clothes after cleaning the child’s stool. It symbolizes The girl is close to God and devoted to the commands of God Almighty. But when she sees that she does not clean well, this indicates that her mind is preoccupied with things that happened in the past, and God knows best. The liquid stool of a child in the girl’s dream indicates her beautiful personality, which is characterized by the kindness that she carries in her heart toward others. And when The girl cleans the child’s stool with soap and water after changing the diaper. It conveys to her good news about the good news that will make her happy. The boy in her dream while cleaning him indicates her marriage in the coming period. And the unmarried young woman cleaning her excrement in the dream is a sign that God will achieve what He wants, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about feces in front of relatives. Interpretation of seeing a child cleaning feces in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the feces of a small child and is already suffering from delayed pregnancy. This dream is good news for her that pregnancy will happen to her, God willing. If the child’s feces smell bad, then this It indicates that there are problems for this woman that she will suffer from. If a woman looks at her clothes in a dream and finds them contaminated with feces, then the child is an unfavorable dream for her. Because it indicates her misbehavior which leads her to scandal, so she must seek forgiveness and supplicate to God Almighty to protect her. Seeing his bed contaminated with the feces of a young child. This indicates that she has been deceived by her husband, and that one of his characteristics is lying. God Almighty is above all things. Seeing the feces of a child in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is bored. However, if she cleans this feces, this indicates the possibility of pregnancy. To her, Glory be to Him. Seeing her cleaning the child’s stool shows that she is a woman trying hard to bring

title: Interpretation of lesbianism in a dream. The meaning of practicing lesbianism in a dream

preview.html: Practicing lesbianism with a woman, a girl with a girl, with my sister, with a mother, with a friend and sister of a single girl, a married woman and a pregnant woman, a lesbian, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of lesbianism in a dreamWhen a man sees that there is a woman who has had intercourse like her, If she knows one or both of them, she will suffer a great misfortune if she knows both of them, or her sin is that she committed a great sin and he did not. He withdraws from it, but if he does not know them about these lesbians in a dream who copulate with each other in his sleep, then he will accept a topic in which there are many prohibitions and sins that will disturb his life after him and he will regret it in vain. If the Virgin sees this, if she does not know these women, then this is an indication that she is now thinking about a forbidden person that stimulates her sexual senses. He must only reach his goal and then leave her, but if she knows them. Whether from friends, neighbors, relatives, or acquaintances, she must stop talking to her friends about sexual life, because this is an indication of the beginning of her moral decline, and her descent into obscene evil. And exploiting the girls around her for this. And when the pregnant woman sees that if she does not know the lesbians she saw in her dream, she will give birth to a female who will grow older without her growing up, and if she knows them, she will get sick during childbirth and bleed. As much time or feeling of lust in the dream. Envy of her life, despite its simplicity, gains from the evil eye her right to harm and misfortunes, and if she does not know them, she is in conflict with her husband, and they may separate. It is if the time of her intercourse with the other woman during her sleep is long. These are buried thoughts and desires that she tries to forget during the day and the conscious mind controls them, but when she sleeps, the conscious mind forgets, and here the subconscious mind wakes up, where these thoughts are stored and she sees them in the form of dreams. In general, such dreams It has no meaning or interpretation because it indicates a person’s personality and psychology, as many psychologists rely on diagnosing and knowing the human condition through their dreams. Interpretation of lesbianism in a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that a woman has intercourse with a woman, then this is a sign of a misfortune or a bad incident, and if He knows the two women, so this is an oasis for them, so it is a sign of that. A great sin that he commits and does not recant from. If a man sees in a dream that a woman had intercourse with a woman whom he did not know, then this is a warning of an upcoming sin against him, and it will lead him to distress and useless sadness. Interpretation of lesbianism in a dream for a single womanIf a virgin girl sees in her dream a woman having sex with a woman This is because she is thinking about sexual matters that provoke her, or a strange man approaches her for a sexual purpose. Interpretation of lesbianism in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a woman who does not know how to engage in lesbianism, this is a sign that she will give birth to a female, but she will have a bad character. Interpretation of lesbianism in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman sees a woman she does not know practicing lesbianism, this is a sign that despite the simplicity of her life, there are those who envy and hold grudges against her, and envy will bring her harm and misery. Interpretation of seeing a woman naked in the dream.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing cats and mice in a dream

preview.html: Cats and mice in a dream: Seeing cats and mice is considered one of the visions that leave confusion in the heart of its owner, as there are many clues among jurists to clarify their meanings, and the interpretation was based on the similarity and contrast between cats and mice in the world of dreams. In this article, we examine in more detail all the specific indicators and details with this dream. We also list the cases that negatively and positively affect the context with sufficient explanation. Cats and mice in a dream. Seeing cats and mice represents psychological conflicts, nervous tension, push and pull, difficulty in normal life. , A change in thoughts and ideas in the mind and the inability to achieve stability and peace. Cats and mice indicate the damage caused to a person by the enemy, and this enemy shows him his love and affection, strikes him with grudges and hatred, misleads him from seeing the truth, spreads doubts in his heart and motivates him. To destroy his life with his own hand. From a psychological point of view, this vision shows the great evil of the neighbors, and whoever sees that he is fighting mice, talking about fools, and entering into useless quarrels, and if he kills a cat or a mouse, this indicates that he has been saved from the worries and evils that You look at him, and escape from a grave ordeal. And if he sees cats and mice running away from him, this is a sign of the escape of thieves and enemies, the escape of the opponent, and the dominance of those who want to harm and harm him, and the situation has changed dramatically. Cats and mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing cats and mice that both indicate On thieves, theft, the problems of plunder and theft, and the treacherous and cunning enemy who conspires against the other and makes traps and tricks for him. If the mice and cats are small in size, this indicates the presence of a cheerful son or a long offspring. And whoever sees that he is eating the meat of cats and mice, this is a sign of bad deeds and gossip, and if There were mice and cats in his house, as this indicates acts of theft and the necessity of fortifying the house from magic and evil. In the interpretation, the cat and mouse symbolize a deceitful man, a cheerful woman, envy, theft, sorcery, envy, false actions, laziness, a malicious enemy, and the outbreak of quarrels and troubles. Cats and mice in a dream for a single woman: Seeing cats and mice indicates exposure to deception and fraud on the part of some, dealing with actions and behaviors that harm them, and falling into problems that have no beginning or end. If he sees white cats and mice, this indicates hypocrisy and hypocrisy, but as for black mice and cats, this indicates hypocrisy and hypocrisy. To doubt and commit a major sin, disappointment and deep remorse. And if he sees a cat or a mouse biting her, this indicates that the matter is over and that one of her friends has been harmed and damaged and that she is going through difficult times and may be exposed to some diseases that she will contract. He recovered after that some time ago. Cats and mice in a dream for a married woman. This vision symbolizes gossip and excessive fatigue, and her husband may have bad morals and morals and burden her with what she cannot bear and humiliate her in marital dealings. And if he sees that he is running away from cats and mice
